G

getCallLog(Context, String) - Method in class com.optimus.mobility.librarysms.LibSMSUtils
Returns call log details by querying Android content providers.
getContacts(Context) - Method in class com.optimus.mobility.librarysms.LibSMSUtils
Returns a JSONArray with all the contact details by querying Android content providers.
getListOfConversations(Context) - Method in class com.optimus.mobility.librarysms.LibSMSUtils
This method uses the activity context to query the Android content provider for the list of conversations(SMS/MMS).
getSMSLog(Context, String) - Method in class com.optimus.mobility.librarysms.LibSMSUtils
Returns SMS log for the duration after the provided TimeStamp value by querying Android content providers.
getTextsfromAddress(Context, String) - Method in class com.optimus.mobility.librarysms.LibSMSUtils
This method uses the activity context to query the Android content provider for the list of SMS/MMS in a conversation.Use with Handler to avoid performance issues as querying system resources has latency.
getTextsfromId(Context, String) - Method in class com.optimus.mobility.librarysms.LibSMSUtils
This method uses the activity context to query the Android content provider for the list of SMS/MMS in a conversation.Use with Handler to avoid performance issues as querying system resources has latency.
getUnreadMessages(Context) - Method in class com.optimus.mobility.librarysms.LibSMSUtils
This method uses the activity context to query the Android content provider for the list of unread SMS/MMS in a conversation.Use with Handler to avoid performance issues as querying system resources has latency.
